description:
PostgreSQL's full-text search functionality offers data integrity, advanced search, and great performance, with thorough documentation. But getting started can be daunting. This session provides a friendly introduction to the basics of full-text search the PostgreSQL way.

PostgreSQL's full-text search functionality offers data integrity, advanced search, and great performance, with thorough documentation. But getting started can be daunting. This session provides a friendly introduction to the basics of full-text search the PostgreSQL way.

Topics covered will include: Quick start: full-text search demo in 10 minutes or less, Indexing basics: tsvector columns, and the triggers that maintain them, GIN and GIST indexes, Relevancy ranking, Stopwords, stemming, synonyms, Wildcards and Boolean algebra.
